lead_paragraph: An article on Saturday about Tampa Bay’s resilience against the Boston Red Sox late in the regular season and during the American League Championship Series referred incorrectly to the circumstances of the Rays’ 2-1 victory over the Red Sox on Sept. 16. Dioner Navarro hit a single in the ninth inning of that game to lift Tampa Bay; his teammate Dan Johnson did not hit a home run to tie the score in the ninth. (Johnson did, however, hit a ninth-inning homer in a 5-4 win against Boston on Sept. 9.).
